card.text: Haas has been the primary facility for Wheaton athletics since the 1990-91 school year before which, all athletics were held at Clark Recreation Center.
Haas houses Balfour Natatorium, Beard Field House, Emerson Gymnasium and athletic offices.
Mens and womens basketball, as well as womens volleyball are held in Emerson gymnasium, while track and cross-country are held in the Beard Field House.
